#summary Small, demo programs for JAI-tools components

=Demo programs=

These are short programs that illustrate the use of the JAI-tools operators, utility classes and the Jiffle language.

You can download or browse the source of the demos [http://code.google.com/p/jai-tools/source/checkout here].

The following pages describe each of the demo programs...

* [DiskMemTileCacheDemo DiskMemTileCache] demo

* [KernelStatsDemo KernelStats] operator

* [RegionalizeDemo Regionalize] operator

* [JiffleDemo Jiffle] language
